column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Our primary goal is for every customer to leave our establishment happy and satisfied
column2: so if you're willing to give us another try
column3: I will do everything in my power to make sure your next experience is vastly superior to this last one. This is important to me because the reputation of our restaurants affects the livelihoods of so many people who work at JINYA
column4: many of whom our customers never see because they work behind the scenes.
